DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect single dose NI-0801 severity nickel-induced allergic contact dermatitis .
DOC.criteria: Aged ≥ 18 ≤ 70 year Either male female lack childbearing potential Previously document nickel allergy Any medical condition , opinion investigator , would interfere safe completion trial would prevent subject provide informed consent .
